description:
Monaco is a tool for deploying monitoring configuration to one or multiple Dynatrace Environments. Monaco can aslo update existing configurations in environments.

The key features of Monaco are:

* **Monitoring as Code**: Monitoring configuration is described using a high-level configuration syntax (JSON and YAML). This allows for configurations to be versioned and treated as you would any other code. Additionally, configuration can be shared and re-used.
* **Change Automation**: Complex changesets can be applied to your configurations with minimal human interaction. This avoids many possible human errors.

For more information, see the [introduction section](https://dynatrace-oss.github.io/dynatrace-monitoring-as-code/).
summary: monaco is a tool for automating the deployment process of Dynatrace Monitoring Configuration to one or multiple Dynatrace environments.
author: Dynatrace Open Source
